oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Preliminary Study on the Effect of Intra-uterine Infusion of Sodium Ceftiofur on Chronic Uterine Infections of Holstein Cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Havaresht, P.
Moradi, A.
Kasravi, R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: postpartum endometritis
days-in-milk
intra-uterine infusion
ceftiofur
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cows suffering from postpartum endometritis which may not be treated with conventional treatments, and thus may have long days-in-milk (DIM), are candidates for disposal from the herd. The aim of this study was to treat such animals with only one intra-uterine (IU) infusion of ceftiofur to keep them in the herd.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2006; 262
